title: Women Can Be Predators Too & Men Can Be Victims | OLAY & FRIENDS
description:
Moriah Mills is harassing Zion Williamson, YK Osiris sexually assaulted Sukihana, Sukihana sexually assaulted a little boy, Ja Morant was suspended... we ended up having a really nuanced discussion about gender roles, rape culture, misogyny, dehumanizing Black men and boys, respectability politics, and a lot more.

Join the channel to support the show!
https://www.YouTube.com/@olurinatti/join
